u-relations-diagram/legend.description: Legend. The style in the legend item is consistent with that of the graph node

u-relations-diagram/layout.description: Layout. The string type is the layout `name` of Cytoscape.js. For details on the LayoutOptions parameters, see [Cytoscape.js Layouts](https://js.cytoscape.org/#layouts).

u-relations-diagram/element-style.description: Element styles, including node and edge, are distinguished according to selector. For details on style settings, see [Cytoscape.js Style](https://js.cytoscape.org/#style).

u-relations-diagram/config.description: Cytoscape.js configuration options. For details, see [Cytoscape.js - Initialisation](https://js.cytoscape.org/#core/initialisation)
